programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Luffy runs into a lethal roadblock in the form of Hawk-Eye Mihawk. The legendary swordsman is determined to halt Luffy's onslaught, but Ivan-san, Boa Hancock, and Jimbei aren't ready to give up the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SWORDSMAN MIHAWK! LUFFY COMES UNDER THE ATTACK OF THE BLACK SWORD!

programme.title: Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE EXTERMINATION STRATEGY IN ACTION! THE POWER OF THE PACIFISTAS!

programme.title: Whitebeard is betrayed ‚Äì and brutally stabbed ‚Äì by one of his own men! In the wake of this unthinkable act of treason, allegations about the legendary pirate bring the battle to a halt!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy's defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ENCIRCLING WALLS ACTIVATED! THE WHITEBEARD PIRATES BACKED INTO A CORNER!

programme.title: With the ice melting beneath his feet, Luffy begins a desperate final charge towards his soon-to-be-executed brother. Should his rescue attempt fail, death will surely embrace them both!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXECUTION ORDER ISSUED! BREAK THROUGH THE ENCIRCLING WALLS!

programme.title: Crocodile's unexpected assistance creates an opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MOVING INTO THE FINAL PHASE! WHITEBEARD'S TRUMP CARD FOR RECOVERY!

programme.title: The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AT THE END OF HIS TETHER! AN ALL-OUT BATTLE AT THE ORIS PLAZA!

programme.title: While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a troubled youth seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT WILL SHORTEN ONE'S LIFE! ENERGY HORMONE, REDUX!

programme.title: Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner's swords hovering above Ace's head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO A PROMISE! LUFFY AND COBY COLLIDE!

programme.title: Whitebeard orders his men to help Luffy clear a path to the execution scaffold, but someone close to the Rubber-man rises to derail the rescue mission at the last second!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SCAFFOLD AT LAST! THE WAY TO ACE HAS OPENED!

programme.title: Luffy must defeat the man who taught him how to fight ‚Äì his own grandfather ‚Äì in order to save Ace. Battling his own flesh and blood won't be easy, but a waxy ally is there to provide backup!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EACH ON DIFFERENT PATHS! LUFFY VS. GARP!

programme.title: Ace is finally free from the execution scaffold! Luffy and his brother make a fearsome team as they blaze a path toward salvation. Ravaged by the war, Whitebeard wistfully commands his men to make the journey to the New World without him!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Despite Whitebeard's order to retreat, Ace is drawn back to the battlefield by the cruel taunts of a Marine adversary. Luffy watches in horror as his brother makes what could be his last stand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT CAN BURN EVEN FIRE! AKAINU'S RUTHLESS PURSUIT!

programme.title: An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together. With his dying breath, Ace begs his brother to convey a message to his fellow pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOOKING FOR THE ANSWER! FIRE FIST ACE DIES ON THE BATTLEFIELD!

programme.title: Anguished cries echo across the battlefield in the wake of Ace's tragic death. Luffy ‚Äì paralyzed by grief ‚Äì must be carried to safety, but Whitebeard summons the strength for one last ferocious attack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS FALLS! WHITEBEARD'S UNSPEAKABLE WRATH!

programme.title: Whitebeard's children watch in horror as the old man faces off against the villainous Blackbeard pirates. Though his injuries are mounting and the odds are stacked against him, Whitebeard never runs away from a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ENDING THE MATTER! WHITEBEARD VS. THE BLACKBEARD PIRATES!

programme.title: The world reacts to Whitebeard's death with shock and awe. Meanwhile, Jimbei risks his life to save Luffy. Blackbeard reveals the depraved depths of his nefarious nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOW BEGINS! BLACKBEARD'S PLOT IS REVEALED!

programme.title: While Blackbeard and his men seek to sink Marineford, Jimbei and Luffy's desperate attempt to flee is thwarted by Akainu's fiery fists. The situation appears dire until a former enemy lends a sandy hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INSATIABLE AKAINU! LAVA FISTS PUMMEL LUFFY!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law and the Heart Pirates offer Luffy a submarine escape route. Blackbeard continues his reckless rampage, and a puny pink-haired marine changes the world with a scream!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DESPERATE SCREAM! COURAGEOUS MOMENTS THAT WILL CHANGE THE FUTURE

programme.title: The Heart Pirates head for the bottom of the ocean as Trafalgar Law prepares to operate on Luffy and Jimbei. Meanwhile, the arrival of Shanks brings the bloodshed to a sudden halt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SHANKS! THE WAR OF THE BEST IS FINALLY OVER!

programme.title: The world rejoices in the wake of Whitebeard's death, and a host of powerful pirates vie for his position. Meanwhile, Luffy's friends fear that Ace's death may be more than the rubber-man can handle ‚Äì if he ever wakes up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MIGHTY LEADERS FACE EACH OTHER DOWN! HERALDING THE 'NEW ERA'!

programme.title: Power-hungry pirates terrorize innocent citizens once protected by Whitebeard. Luffy's nightmarish awakening sends him on a reckless rampage that could land him in an early grave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE MAIDEN ISLAND! THE HARSH REALITY FALLS UPON LUFFY!

programme.title: One Piece X Toriko Crossover
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A flashback to the younger days of Luffy and Ace reveals their unusual upbringing under the not-so-watchful eye of villainous mountain bandits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AND ACE! THE STORY OF HOW THE BROTHERS MET!

programme.title: The flashback continues as Ace robs a ruthless gang of pirates, and Luffy is left to take the fall! Will Ace and his friend Sabo let Luffy be tortured to death - or will they risk their high seas dreams to save him?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SABO! THE BOY AT THE GRAY TERMINAL!

programme.title: Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates! Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight ‚Äì even when he's outnumbered!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WON'T RUN! ACE'S DESPERATE RESCUE OPERATION!

programme.title: When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend's past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates and hoist a toast to brotherhood!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE SEA SOMEDAY! THE PLEDGE OF THE THREE BRATS!

programme.title: After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LEAVING THE DADAN FAMILY FOR GOOD?! THE KIDS' HIDEOUT HAS BEEN BUILT!

programme.title: Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that's been stealing their food. Ace gets angry when his father's identity is revealed. Sabo's parents hire pirates to track down their son!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BECOMING AN APPRENTICE?! A MAN WHO FOUGHT AGAINST THE KING OF THE PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeat the big tiger ‚Äì and becoming a good captain!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE AGAINST THE BIG TIGER! WHO IS GOING TO BE CAPTAIN?!

programme.title: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FREEDOM TAKEN AWAY! THE NOBLES' PLOT CLOSING IN ON THE BROTHERS!

programme.title: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIRE HAS BEEN SET! THE GRAY TERMINAL IN CRISIS!

programme.title: Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last-ditch escape attempt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WHERE CAN FREEDOM BE FOUND? A SAD DEPARTURE OF A BOY!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'√©tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: King of the Cowboys, (1943, Western)
programme.desc: Saboteurs are blowing up government warehouses (during World War II). Roy and his pals work undercover to put an end to their operations.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine might in fact have hidden gold deposits. Leave it to Roy to find out the truth!

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasn‚Äôt worn his badge long... and won‚Äôt live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, War Drama)
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Vampires)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmusch‚Äôs ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, War Drama)
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: ‚ÄúThe Valley of Death‚Äù.

programme.title: Food Wars!

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: Soma spends his days battling his father to see who the best chef at his family restaurant is. Things get complicated when a developer tries to muscle in on their land.

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: Soma goes up against a difficult foe, Erina Nakiri, owner of the 'God's Tongue.' Her palate can literally make or break your career!

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu: End of the Year

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu

programme.sub-title: Mr. Sanematsu Ep. 9 / UMA Expedition Team / The Choromatsu Incident

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu

programme.sub-title: UMA Expedition Team 2 / Jar / Karamatsu Taxi / Totty Quiz

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
programme.desc: Having grown weary of this universe, the Space Pirate Shazaar decides to make a change. Later, it turns out Matsuzo is somewhat of a gourmand, then a cute girl named Kinko Inuyama moves in next door to the Matsunos and miraculously befriends the boys.
programme.sub-title: Space Pirate / Gourmet Episode / The Cutie Next Door

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
programme.desc: A third UMA expedition starts things off, then Ichimatsu becomes nervous when too many good things start happening to him and Jyushimatsu. Finally, Karahiko and Todomi take a trip up into the mountains and end up staying in a haunted Japanese inn.

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
programme.desc: Hungry Town has all the old charm of post-WWII Japan. Though not wealthy, the neighborhood teems with energy and its inhabitants are busy with life except for Iyami, who refuses to work and spends his days in poverty until he meets a child named Kiku.

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
programme.desc: Dekapan becomes President on a whim, Iyami sets up a new con with Chibita and Hatabou's help, and the brothers decide that this year, for once, they're gonna get Valentine's Day chocolates no matter what.

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
programme.desc: Another round of miscellaneous absurdity.

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
programme.desc: The boys stop in at a late night ramen shop, Tottimi wants to earn some quick cash (but not doing this!), and Matsuyo decides to send one of her precious, stupid NEETs to a correctional facility.
programme.sub-title: Late Night Himatsuya / BANANA / NEET Correctional Facility

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu

programme.sub-title: Dayon and Dayon / Iyami is Troubled / Late Night Himatsuya

programme.title: Mr. Osomatsu
